mapper.select: SELECT h.city_cd AS destination, h.hotel_nm AS hotel_name, MIN(h.ci_date::TIMESTAMP) AS final_check_in_date, -- Earliest check-in date MAX(h.co_date::TIMESTAMP) AS final_check_out_date, -- Latest check-out date SUM(h.price) AS total_price, -- Total price of stay h.photo_url FROM hotels h WHERE h.ci_date >= #{checkIn} -- Filter for check-in date AND h.co_date <= #{checkOut} -- Filter for check-out date GROUP BY h.hotel_nm, h.city_cd, h.photo_url HAVING SUM(h.price) <= #{budget}; -- Filter for total price after aggregation
